trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryRights" /> enumeration specifies the access rights that are assigned to an Active Directory Domain Services object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryRights" /> 列舉型別會指定指派給 Active Directory 網域服務物件的存取權限。

trans-unit.source: The right to get or set the SACL in the object security descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定物件安全性描述元中 SACL 的權限。

trans-unit.source: The right to create children of the object.
trans-unit.target: 建立物件之子系的權限。

trans-unit.source: The right to delete the object.
trans-unit.target: 刪除物件的權限。

trans-unit.source: The right to delete children of the object.
trans-unit.target: 刪除物件之子系的權限。

trans-unit.source: The right to delete all children of this object, regardless of the permissions of the children.
trans-unit.target: 刪除這個物件之所有子系的權限，不論子系的使用權限為何。

trans-unit.source: A customized control access right.
trans-unit.target: 自訂的控制存取權限。

trans-unit.source: For a list of possible extended rights, see the topic "Extended Rights" in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/). For more information about extended rights, see the topic "Control Access Rights" in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/).
trans-unit.target: 如需可能的延伸權限的清單，請參閱 MSDN Library ([http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/)) 中的＜延伸權限＞主題。如需延伸權限的詳細資訊，亦請參閱 MSDN Library ([http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/)) 中的＜控制存取權限＞主題。

trans-unit.source: The right to create or delete children, delete a subtree, read and write properties, examine children and the object itself, add and remove the object from the directory, and read or write with an extended right.
trans-unit.target: 建立或刪除子系、刪除樹狀子目錄、讀取和寫入屬性、檢查子系和物件自身、加入和移除目錄的物件，以及使用延伸權限讀取或寫入的權限。

trans-unit.source: The right to read permissions on, and list the contents of, a container object.
trans-unit.target: 讀取容器物件上的使用權限，以及列出容器物件內容的權限。

trans-unit.source: The right to read permissions on this object, read all the properties on this object, list this object name when the parent container is listed, and list the contents of this object if it is a container.
trans-unit.target: 讀取這個物件上的使用權限，讀取這個物件上的所有屬性，當列出父容器 (Container) 時列出這個物件名稱，以及如果這個物件是容器則列出其內容的權限。

trans-unit.source: The right to read permissions on this object, write all the properties on this object, and perform all validated writes to this object.
trans-unit.target: 讀取這個物件上的使用權限，寫入這個物件上的所有屬性，以及執行這個物件之所有已驗證寫入的權限。

trans-unit.source: The right to list children of this object.
trans-unit.target: 列出這個物件之子系的權限。

trans-unit.source: For more information about this right, see the topic "Controlling Object Visibility" in the MSDN Library [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
trans-unit.target: 如需這個權限的詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN Library ([http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library)) 中的＜控制物件的可視性＞主題。

trans-unit.source: The right to list a particular object.
trans-unit.target: 列出特定物件的權限。

trans-unit.source: For more information about this right, see the topic "Controlling Object Visibility" in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
trans-unit.target: 如需這個權限的詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN Library ([http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library)) 中的＜控制物件的可視性＞主題。

trans-unit.source: The right to read data from the security descriptor of the object, not including the data in the SACL.
trans-unit.target: 從物件的安全性描述元讀取資料 (不包括 SACL 中的資料) 的權限。

trans-unit.source: The right to read properties of the object.
trans-unit.target: 讀取物件之屬性的權限。

trans-unit.source: The right to perform an operation that is controlled by a validated write access right.
trans-unit.target: 執行由已驗證寫入存取權限所控制之作業的權限。

trans-unit.source: The right to use the object for synchronization.
trans-unit.target: 使用同步物件的權限。

trans-unit.source: This right enables a thread to wait until that object is in the signaled state.
trans-unit.target: 這個權限可讓執行緒等待，直到物件處於收到信號狀態為止。

trans-unit.source: The right to modify the DACL in the object security descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 修改物件安全性描述元中 DACL 的權限。

trans-unit.source: The right to assume ownership of the object.
trans-unit.target: 假設物件擁有權的權限。

trans-unit.source: The user must be an object trustee.
trans-unit.target: 使用者必須是物件信任項。

trans-unit.source: The user cannot transfer the ownership to other users.
trans-unit.target: 使用者不可以將擁有權傳送給其他使用者。

trans-unit.source: The right to write properties of the object.
trans-unit.target: 寫入物件之屬性的權限。
